Name: Maze Masters
About the game: Maze Masters is a creative spin of the classic maze games, made and modernized in 3d where you try to find your way out of the maze while fighting your way through the monsters in the maze with your AK-47 Rifle as well as trying to find the hidden objectives scattered on each map. You can choose to escape the maze or just fight your way through the monsters in the survival mode. CONTROLS : Movement: W A S D Shoot: Left Click Aim: Right Click Space: Drop Highlighter Left Shift: Sprint
